name: CloneFrenzy
description:
Game for LudumDare #50 - April 2022 - Theme: Delay the inevitable

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/clone-frenzy

Intructions

Skip your clones as long as you can

Clones keep spawning until they reach you. Run away from them to stay alive.

Controls

Arrow keys to move and jump

  • Left Move: Left Arrow
  • Right Move: Right Arrow
  • Jump: Up Arrow
